briefdescription.para: RIFF 44-byte header structure for MS wav files.
Detect RIFF file and parse its header if detected.

simplesect.para: TRUE if it's a RIFF file, FALSE if not, -1 if an error occurred.

briefdescription.para: Detect NIST file and parse its header if detected.

simplesect.para: TRUE if it's a NIST file, FALSE if not, -1 if an error occurred.

briefdescription.para: Default "detection" function, just opens the file and keeps the default configuration parameters.
"Detect" Sphinx MFCC files, meaning verify their lousy headers, and set up some parameters from the config object.

memberdef.argsstring: (int16 *buf, int32 nsamp, int32 nchans, int32 whichchan)
memberdef.name: mixnpick_channels

briefdescription.para: Process PCM audio from a filehandle.

detaileddescription.para: Assume that wtf->infh is positioned just after the file header.

briefdescription.para: Process Sphinx MFCCs/logspectra from a filehandle.

detaileddescription.para: Assume that wtf->infh is positioned just after the file header.

briefdescription.para: Release a waveform to feature converter.
